summary: Tony Kipkemboi is a key player at crewAI, contributing his extensive expertise in AI to help businesses innovate through AI agents. With accolades such as the Distinguished Scholar Award and engaging in influential networks like Black in AI, Tony is well-poised in the Washington DC-Baltimore Area to drive technological advancements forward.
key_highlights: AI enthusiast assisting businesses with innovation through AI agents.
Holds a Confluent Fundamentals Accreditation and other certifications.
Distinguished Scholar Award recipient from Southern New Hampshire University (2020).
